dedicatedCloudDashboardTilesOptionsServi: With NSX, you can configure the rules for accessing your networks, create your security policy and deploy the different network services that you need to build your infrastructure, in just a few minutes!

VMware Network Virtualization (NSX) and VMware vRealize Operations (vROps)

Use NSX to configure access rules for your networks, create a security policy and deploy the network services you need to build your infrastructure in just a few minutes.

With vROps, you can manage your infrastructure, enable monitoring on your virtual machines, detect any anomalies and anticipate resource requirements easily to take care of your platform’s quality of service (QoS).
Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS)

Payment card data is the target of a number of different hacking and fraud attempts. With PCI DSS, OVH has implemented the very strictest security measures to ensure the very highest level of security for your payment infrastructures.

Healthcare data and information systems are an essential part of patient privacy. OVH is aware of these issues and as such, has poured all of its security know-how and expertise into this new HDS solution in compliance with the industry's most rigorous security standards.
Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA)
